content:
Yes, there are electric heavy-duty trucks available for sale in the United States. Some examples include:

* Tesla Semi
* Rivian R1T
* Nikola Two
* Daimler eCascadia
* Volvo VNR Electric
* Freightliner eCascadia
* Peterbilt Model 579 EV
* Kenworth T680E
* Mack LR Electric
* Fuso eCanter

Please note that this list may not be comprehensive and is subject to change as the electric heavy-duty truck market is still in its early stages and new models are being developed and released. Also it's worth to mention that some of these models are not yet available for sale, they are in pre-order or testing phase.
